subject.description: Young woman with a fit, curvaceous physique and tan skin reclining outdoors.
subject.hair: Long, wavy, dirty blonde hair with lighter highlights, parted in the middle, cascading over shoulders.
subject.face: Oval face shape, natural makeup, full lips, dark eyes, direct gaze at the camera.
subject.apparel: Black asymmetrical one-piece swimsuit (monokini) featuring a large central cutout on the torso, a single strap over the left shoulder, and gold metal ring hardware connecting the fabric panels at the center chest and right hip.
subject.accessories: Gold chain necklace, small gold hoop earrings, thin gold bracelet on the right wrist.
subject.anatomy_constraints: Preserve exact body proportions; bust volume must be full, heavy, and naturally projected with visible cleavage depth; hips are curvy; skin texture includes natural pores and subtle variations; do not minimize or flatten curves.

pose.body_position: Reclining comfortably on a beige outdoor sofa.
pose.orientation: Torso angled slightly to the viewer's left, hips turned slightly to the right.
pose.arms: Right arm is bent with the elbow resting on the sofa back cushion, hand lightly touching the forehead/temple area. Left arm is extended downwards, resting naturally along the left hip and thigh.
pose.legs: Legs are extended towards the bottom right of the frame, with the left thigh prominent in the foreground.
pose.head: Head is upright, facing forward with a calm, confident expression.

environment.background: A clear blue swimming pool immediately behind the sofa. Beyond the pool, a modern white building with large black-framed glass sliding doors and white curtains. Lush tropical greenery, including palm trees and potted plants, surrounds the area.
environment.furniture: Beige upholstered outdoor sofa with light wood armrests and frame.

camera.shot_type: Medium-full shot, capturing from the top of the head down to the mid-thighs.
camera.angle: Eye-level to slightly high angle, looking slightly down at the reclining subject.
camera.focus: Sharp focus on the subject's face and torso, with high depth of field keeping the background architecture distinct but slightly softer than the foreground.
camera.perspective: Natural perspective, no wide-angle distortion, preserving the volume and depth of the subject relative to the background.

lighting.direction: Overhead and slightly from the right, creating defined shadows under the chin, nose, and on the sofa cushions.
lighting.quality: High contrast sunlight with strong highlights on the skin and hair, and deep, realistic shadows providing three-dimensional volume.
lighting.shadows: Sharp, realistic cast shadows from the subject onto the beige cushions.

mood_and_expression.expression: Neutral to slightly alluring, calm, direct eye contact.

style_and_realism.rendering: High-fidelity texture rendering (fabric, skin, water, stone), ray-traced lighting accuracy.
style_and_realism.aesthetic: Influencer travel aesthetic, clean and high-end.

colors_and_tone.palette: Neutral tones (beige sofa, white building), black swimsuit, vibrant pool blue, lush green plants, warm tan skin tones.
colors_and_tone.contrast: High contrast due to direct sunlight.
colors_and_tone.saturation: Natural and vibrant, especially the blues and greens.

quality_and_technical_details.texture_quality: Visible fabric weave on swimsuit and sofa, realistic skin texture with pores and moles, water ripples in pool.

depth_control.purpose: Depth, volume, and camera-to-body spatial lock
constraints: preserve chest foreground dominance if present

forbidden_elements: tightened, lifted, or artificially supported breasts
